summary: THE WELDING ON THE TOP HINGE OF THE DRIVER DOOR SEPARATED.  *JB  WHEN THE CONSUMER SEARCHED FOR THE SOURCE OF THE WIND NOISE, HE DISCOVERED THAT THE UPPER DOOR HINGE WAS LOOSE, AND THE GROOVE WAS WORN INTO THE BRACKET.  ALSO THE HINGE BRACKET WAS COMING LOOSE FROM THE DOOR FRAME.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THIS WAS A DEFECT.  SCC
